insights.quote: I definitely use the calendar. And to me, that's great because it's kind of the month at a glance and pretty time efficient in terms of looking through what's coming up.
insights.significance: Highlights the value users find in a clear, organized calendar feature.
insights.insight: Users appreciate tools that save time and provide a comprehensive view of upcoming activities.

insights.quote: I thought was really helpful... because they give you the email of who to contact if you have questions.
insights.significance: Indicates the importance of direct communication channels.
insights.insight: Users desire accessible support and clarity on how to connect with others in the organization.

insights.quote: the description wasn't clear to me, and it really didn't come across as exactly what it was.
insights.significance: Reveals a point of confusion that led to frustration.
insights.insight: Users struggle with unclear information, which can hinder their involvement.

insights.quote: I think that thing needs to get... a little bit more like another kind of website where like your account would be kind of one of the main things on the front page.
insights.significance: Recommends a redesign that prioritizes user needs.
insights.insight: Users want a more intuitive and user-centered design in the website's layout.

insights.quote: I think there's a lot of people that kind of get, you know, agree to get involved and don't really want to put the time in.
insights.significance: Indicates a common barrier to engagement.
insights.insight: Many users may lack the motivation to navigate complex systems, affecting participation.

insights.quote: I feel like that was a question, people that wanted their address changed and just didn't know how to do it.
insights.significance: Shows a common usability issue that users face.
insights.insight: Users may encounter hurdles in managing their personal information, leading to frustration.

insights.quote: You have to go to your profile. You have to go to the member page.
insights.significance: Highlights a convoluted process that adds to user frustration.
insights.insight: Users experience difficulty navigating the platform due to non-intuitive pathways.

insights.quote: It should be like, of course it's just there.
insights.significance: Expresses disbelief about the lack of visibility of important information.
insights.insight: Users expect straightforward access to essential functionalities without extra effort.

insights.quote: I know a lot of people always talk about the third year process.
insights.significance: Indicates knowledge gaps among users regarding processes.
insights.insight: Users may lack understanding of processes due to insufficient visibility or communication.

insights.quote: I think that the whole, it just was too complicated for the training with the two-point verification.
insights.significance: Shows that training complexity can deter user engagement.
insights.insight: Users feel overwhelmed by overly complicated security processes, which may lead to disengagement.

insights.quote: You can visibly see people's confidence just drop.
insights.significance: Reveals a strong emotional response to usability challenges.
insights.insight: Users' confidence and enthusiasm can be significantly affected by their experiences on the platform.

insights.significance: Identifies a critical user concern regarding navigation.
insights.insight: Users struggle with understanding how to navigate the platform, impacting their overall experience.

insights.quote: I don't know how to do that. Maybe that's a color code that needs to happen.
insights.significance: Suggests a simple solution to a complex problem.
insights.insight: Users often have practical ideas for improvements that could enhance usability.

insights.quote: You're saying we're already meeting- They're already there, they're already like tagged as, do you want to receive the alumni emails?
insights.significance: Illustrates a disconnect between data management and user experience.
insights.insight: Users want better visibility and access to existing resources and data.

insights.quote: If they get lost in it, I think then that's, then their confidence goes way down and they're not so excited.
insights.significance: Links usability to user engagement and motivation.
insights.insight: Users' experiences directly impact their willingness to engage with the platform.
